title: Bug with Irelia and Fiora's Parry.
body:
Irelia's Equilibrium strike http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/59/Equilibrium_Strike.png is a slow if her Target has lower health than her and if you Equilibrium strike a Fiora on far less HP than you it stuns you regardless; if she parries http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/de/Riposte.png it.

I'm not sure if this is intended but it doesn't seem fair to be hitting an Equilibrium strike on her and having it parried and it stunning you, even though it isn't actually effectively meant to be applying an immobilize and is only meant to be applying a slow because she has lower health than you.
